org.araneaframework
Interface Viewable

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicationComponent, ApplicationService, ApplicationWidget, Control, FilteredInputControl, Viewable.ViewableComponent, Viewable.ViewableService, Viewable.ViewableWidget
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseApplicationComponent, BaseApplicationService, BaseApplicationWidget, BaseControl, FloatControl, NumberControl, RelocatableDecorator, TextControl, TimestampControl
public interface Viewable
extends java.io.Serializable

Viewable is a component which has a view model via getViewModel().

Viewable should not be implemented directly but subinterfaces ComponentInterface, ServiceInterface, WidgetInterface should be used.

Author:
"Toomas RÃ¶mer" , Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
